intro.description:
Able AI is an AI-powered platform that helps you apply for EB-1 and EB-2 Green 
Cards faster and more affordably than with a lawyer.

team.title:
We are a team of immigrants 
who have received approval 
for EB-1 and EB-2 visas
team.text:
so we uniquely understand our clients' challenges. Our 
mission is to help qualified professionals obtain their 
Green Cards without stress or high costs. 

The AI era has allowed us to make this dream a reality! 
Be our next success story!

description:

U.S.

card1.title: Replaces
card1.description:
Replaces an immigration attorney,
saving you $10 000

card2.title: Builds
card2.description:
Builds your case for an EB-1/EB-2
Green Card

card3.description:
Evaluates your chances of getting a

Fills out the petition for you and
helps gather all necessary
documents

feature1.title: Cost Savings of at least  5 times

feature2.title: Time Savings
feature2.description:
*In the U.S., immigration attorneys typically take 3–6 months to 
build an EB-1/2 case

feature3.title: Higher Approval Chances
feature3.description:
*The platform builds your case based on thousands of previously 
approved petitions

feature4.title: 24/7 Feedback
feature4.description:
*ABL AI responds to questions immediately, whereas attorneys 
usually respond within a day

cart2.text: Get a case plan from an expert

questions.title: Any questions?
questions.text:
Leave your email, and we will get in touch with you to answer 
all your questions.
